description:
Discover this Made-in-Canada knit beanie, a winter essential crafted from eco-friendly Polylana® recycled polyester yarn, known for its reduced environmental impact.

  • This beanie combines warmth and eco-consciousness, featuring a turned-up brim to keep your ears toasty and a blend of polyester and soft acrylic for optimal comfort during outdoor activities
name: Kombi Alta Toque - Unisex
